hymn.title: Christ in Numbers

layout.singingstanza: God wants His ho -- ly peo -- ple to be -- come His ar -- my; Rise up, all a -- ges! March on for His tes -- ti -- mo -- ny; Christ is our mean -- ing of life, tes -- ti -- mo -- ny and cen -- ter, In ev -- ery -- thing He's the way, the goal and the Lead -- er.

hymn.notes: Banner song for the 1998 Yearend West Malaysia Youth Training.

lyrics.stanza: For God to gain His army, priesthood, and dwelling place, Defilement must be dealt with, that to Him we'd be chaste, Make us the same as You, Lord, truly righteous and holy, Meeting Your strict requirements, becoming Your army.

In our journey to gain Christ—the good land giv'n by God, Hindrances and trials would come when we walk with the Lord, Through suff'rings we'd be humbled and in spirit contrite, And be exposed through testing, thus purged and purified.

To inherit the good land, we must be renumbered; Make a willing vow to Him to fulfill His standard. For the Lord's up-to-date move, let's fight and pay the price, Enter and possess the land, our all-inclusive Christ!
